verses.verse: לֹ֤א <WH3808> not לָ֥נוּ יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Not unto us O LORD לֹ֫א <WH3808> not לָ֥נוּ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> But לְ֭שִׁמְךָ <WH8034> not unto us but unto thy name תֵּ֣ן <WH5414> give כָּב֑וֹד <WH3519> glory עַל־ <WH5921> Because חַ֝סְדְּךָ֗ <WH2617> for thy mercy עַל־ <WH5921> because אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH571> [and] for thy truth's
לָ֭מָּה <WH4100> Why יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> say הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> Wherefore should the heathen אַיֵּה־ <WH346> Where נָ֝֗א <WH4994> now אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> angels
וֵֽאלֹהֵ֥ינוּ <WH430> But our God בַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> [is] in the heavens כֹּ֭ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he חָפֵ֣ץ <WH2654> whatsoever he hath pleased עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> he hath done
עֲ‍ֽ֭צַבֵּיהֶם <WH6091> Their idols כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> [are] silver וְזָהָ֑ב <WH2091> and gold מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗ה <WH4639> the work יְדֵ֣י <WH3027> hands אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men's

פֶּֽה־ <WH6310> They have mouths לָ֭הֶם <WH1992> they וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <WH1696> but they speak עֵינַ֥יִם <WH5869> not eyes לָ֝הֶ֗ם <WH1992> they וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יִרְאֽוּ׃ <WH7200> have they but they see
אָזְנַ֣יִם <WH241> They have ears לָ֭הֶם וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יִשְׁמָ֑עוּ <WH8085> but they hear אַ֥ף <WH639> not noses לָ֝הֶ֗ם וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יְרִיחֽוּן׃ <WH7306> have they but they smell

יְדֵיהֶ֤ם ׀ <WH3027> They have hands וְלֹ֬א <WH3808> cannot יְמִישׁ֗וּן <WH4184> but they handle רַ֭גְלֵיהֶם <WH7272> not feet וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יְהַלֵּ֑כוּ <WH1980> have they but they walk לֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot יֶ֝הְגּ֗וּ <WH1897> not neither speak בִּגְרוֹנָֽם׃ <WH1627> they through their throat

כְּ֭מוֹהֶם <WH3644> like יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> will become עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <WH6213> They that make כֹּ֭ל <WH3605> Everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בֹּטֵ֣חַ <WH982> them are like unto them [so is] every one that trusteth בָּהֶֽם׃
יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> O Israel בְּטַ֣ח <WH982> trust בַּיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> thou in the LORD עֶזְרָ֖ם <WH5828> he [is] their help וּמָגִנָּ֣ם <WH4043> and their shield הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> O
בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> O house אַ֭הֲרֹן <WH175> of Aaron בִּטְח֣וּ <WH982> trust בַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> in the LORD עֶזְרָ֖ם <WH5828> he [is] their help וּמָגִנָּ֣ם <WH4043> and their shield הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> that

יִרְאֵ֣י <WH3373> Ye that fear יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> the LORD בִּטְח֣וּ <WH982> trust בַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> in the LORD עֶזְרָ֖ם <WH5828> he [is] their help וּמָגִנָּ֣ם <WH4043> and their shield הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> The LORD זְכָרָ֪נוּ <WH2142> hath been mindful יְבָ֫רֵ֥ךְ <WH1288> of us he will bless יְ֭בָרֵךְ <WH1288> [us] he will bless אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel יְ֝בָרֵ֗ךְ <WH1288> he will bless אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> of Aaron
יְ֭בָרֵךְ <WH1288> He will bless יִרְאֵ֣י <WH3373> them that fear יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD הַ֝קְּטַנִּ֗ים <WH6996> [both] small עִם־ <WH5973> together הַגְּדֹלִֽים׃ <WH1419> and great
יֹסֵ֣ף <WH3254> shall increase יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5921> and עֲ֝לֵיכֶ֗ם <WH5921> and וְעַל־ <WH5921> and בְּנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1121> you more and more you and your children
בְּרוּכִ֣ים <WH1288> Ye [are] blessed אַ֭תֶּם <WH859> you לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <WH6213> which made שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> and earth

הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> The heaven שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> [even] the heavens לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> [are] the LORD'S וְ֝הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> but the earth נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> hath he given לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> to the children אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men

לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor הַ֭מֵּתִים <WH4191> The dead יְהַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> praise יָ֑הּ <WH3050> not the LORD וְ֝לֹ֗א <WH3808> Nor כָּל־ <WH3605> any יֹרְדֵ֥י <WH3381> neither any that go down דוּמָֽה׃ <WH1745> into silence

וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ ׀ <WH587> we נְבָ֘רֵ֤ךְ <WH1288> But we will bless יָ֗הּ <WH3050> the LORD מֵֽעַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> this וְעַד־ <WH5704> from this time forth and for עוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> evermore הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> the LORD
